‚Ä¶ Keep in mind this is essentially the main gym on base. Where most people work out in the morning before reporting for duty. Want a hot shower before heading to work? Go somewhere else. Last Saturday I went to use the ab room and found a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ -wide basketball that's segregated for additional space with the stationary bikes(due to Covid). There's a lockeroom with shower access. They have 3 calisthenics bars, monkey bars and other calisthenics tools. Before the current conditions ‚Ä¶
This is gym is for military and people who work on the base. The work out area is great with 2 racketball courts. There is a locker room with shower but the showers needs some updating.
I'm grateful they were open early but the cold shower was a rough start to the day! None of the women's showers had warm water :(
